history.proof: intros P Q H a b Hreduce. induction Hreduce using reduce_ind. - qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_in_pO. - qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_in_pO,reduce_inv2.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hreduce.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : forall a : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P a, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H1 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b H2 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) r Unable to unify "reduce ?M2185 ?M2186 ?M2187 ?M2188 ?M2190 ?M2191 ?M2192 ?M2193 ?M2195 ?M2196 ?M2197 ?M2198 ?M2200 ?M2201 (pO ?M2185 ?M2196)" with "reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) r".

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hreduce.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hreduce.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (IHreduce P Q H) as IH.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHreduce was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hreduce.
exceptions.tactic: apply reduce_inv2 in r as [x [x0 [H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]]].

ctx: intros P Q H a b Hreduce.
exceptions.tactic: apply H in H2 as Hin.

original: intros P Q H a b Hreduce. induction Hreduce using reduce_ind. - apply reduce_in_pO. apply H. auto. - specialize (IHreduce P Q H) as IH. apply reduce_inv2 in r as [x [x0 [H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]]]. apply H in H2 as Hin. apply reduce_mults_inv_lem in H4 as Hmults. + eapply reduce_inv. 8: apply IH. all: try auto. + auto.
